resources.string: Hi, this is a new Netology! Once upon a time, Netology it started with intensive courses in online marketing. Then there are courses in design, development, analytics and management. We grow ourselves and help to grow students: from beginners to confident professionals. But the most important thing remains with us: we believe that everyone already has the power that makes them want bigger, aim higher, run faster. Our mission - help to embark on the path of growth and start a chain changes -> http://netolo.gy/fyb
Netology. University of Internet Professions of the Future
